Review.Titre: Modernization doesn't always make things better
Review.Contenu: I have been taking my kids and grandkids to the Nutcracker for over forty years. I have seen productions across Canada plus in Russia. The ballet artists were spectacular, I just had a hard time with how the production was made politically correct by removing the country themed costumes to match the music, removing the Arabian  women with vails, the Russian , Chinese and Spanish dancers. National costumes and dance are not offensive. You couldn't even recognize the sugar plum fairies in this production. The costumes are part of what made this  production special. Unless you were familiar with each piece of music you hand no idea of what was happening. This ballet dates back to 1892 and it is a shame to see it manipulated to match todays outlook.

Our tickets would not scan. They pulled us aside along with others that had purchased online and had physical tickets. They had to contact a supervisor, then they had to contact ticket master for verification of validity of tickets. Very dissatisfied with that.The concert was excellent. Just the handling of the tickets was not acceptable!

Review.Titre: The seating was very deceiving when…
Review.Contenu: The seating was very deceiving when choosing where to sit.  We ended up being so far in the corner we couldn’t see half of the show the way the stage was angled.

When I purchased my tickets, they were never advertised as “partial view” and then when my tickets appeared on my account 48 hours prior to the show, to my surprise they said “partial view”. Very annoyed about this, as the tickets should have been advertised at purchase as partial view.

Review.Titre: My ticket would not scan at the event.
Review.Contenu: My ticket would not scan at the event.It wouldn’t scan in my apple wallet or from my ticket master email. I was rejected entry, however I spoke with a hockey Canada official who agreed my ticket was legitimate. I then was permitted in. I hope this doesn’t happen at the prospect game in January in Moncton.

Why is the venue cashless? That is unlawful. Businesses are not allowed to refuse cash. I will be boycotting this venue moving forward.I guess the ticket process needs to be secure, which is why no screenshots or printed copies. I don't really like it. What happens to those who don't have a phone? They can't go? That's crazy!

I was very upset to learn that my seat selection was a partially obstructed view!  section 109, row 9 seat 1.  I could not see the full right hand section of the stage and, since Trans Siberian Orchestra is all about stage presentation and light show, it was extremely disappointing.  I would not have booked this seat if it had been noted on Ticketmaster that is was obstructed view.  I think that some compensation is in order.

The seating on the floor needs to be spaced out better. Everyone is stuck to each other, you can barely move. You can't put anything down without knocking it  or having someone else knock it over. We are all stuck together like a can of sardines, and it isn't very comfortable at all, especially for a 2 hour show.

Review.Titre: Great concert! Presale code didn’t make tickets cheaper
Review.Contenu: The actual concert was great but I think you guys need to not inflate ticket prices so high. actually give people a chance to get tickets.Also my presale code didn’t make my tickets cheaper at all. That being said I was happy I got a chance to get tickets for this show.

Review.Titre: Ticketmaster is great, there are just a couple of small details I wish were different
Review.Contenu: I always have a great experience from Ticketmaster, the seats were good with a good price.  The only thing I wish is that we could buy more than 8 tickets at a time, for instance, I needed 10 tickets to this game because it was for a birthday, but I had to buy 8, and my husband had to get 2 using his account.  (even then it tracked us and wouldn't let him buy the tickets until he turned off wifi)  Also, I should be able to buy 3 tickets if i want to, I often see 1 seat left so it sucks that you can't buy 3 if you need 3.  That is the difference in 5 stars and the 3 I gave.

Review.Titre: I paid for parking but it appears…
Review.Contenu: I paid for parking but it appears parking was free

Review.Titre: Would like a printable version of the…
Review.Contenu: Would like a printable version of the tickets. One person in my party does not have a cell phone to transfer ticket.

Well, it's ticketmaster. Gotta love monopolized platforms with zero competition.  Prices at least being up front about fees finally are nice. Pain in the ass to get a refund though.  Unless there is something postponed or canceled with the event, there is no opportunity to obtain a refund.  I won tickets through a local radio show in the week leading up to the event, and wasn't able to sell my tickets to someone else.  Contacted ticketmaster and was told there was nothing they could do about it. Pretty poor experience on that front.  The agent I talked with was nothing but polite and helpful in explaining available options i could pursue.  Ticketmaster policies prevented a direct refund in this instance.

Review.Titre: the fees are high and discriminate
Review.Contenu: the fees are high and discriminatewant the option of paper tickets, not just phone

After buying tickets, I could not attend due to a family event.  I successfully shared two tickets with a friend.  Almost a month ago, I sold two tickets at cost but have not received payment.  I have completed your online tax and bank forms multiple times.  Not impressed.

Review.Titre: What happens if you don’t have the app?
Review.Contenu: I cannot install the Ticketmaster app on my phone so I wasn’t sure if I could get into the show. I printed the email showing that I paid, hoping that would suffice. Fortunately, that venue (the Burton Cummings) had a cashier who quickly printed a paper ticket. I felt lucky that it worked out, but I didn’t appreciate worrying about it for days after buying the ticket.

Review.Titre: The reminders for the event and easy…
Review.Contenu: The reminders for the event and easy access to our tickets were great. Venue wasGood and parking well organized. The service fees per ticket are disappointing when families are calculating the cost of their purchase (misleading once they’re added in to base price). Wish these fees were lower.

It was a good show, the guys could really sing.  HOWEVER, they have not yet become an act. They seemed awkward with one another and kept referring to the snow in Winnipeg.  There is no snow in Winnipeg, look out the window!

Review.Titre: The seats we had purchased were not the…
Review.Contenu: The seats we had purchased were not the “cheapest” seats available. We ended up with a completely obstructed view. Myself, my mother and daughter could not see the show. We had to go stand to watch the show. Very disappointing as there was no details during booking that stated obstructed view

Review.Titre: Doors open and start time of bands not…
Review.Contenu: Doors open and start time of bands not listed on ticket face. Only 7pm on ticket without clearly stating doors or when band start. Missed first band (Whitechapel) because thought doors open at 7pm.

Review.Titre: Turned Away from the Free Merandise Queue with Platinum VIP Tickets
Review.Contenu: The description of what is included with each tier of ticket is lacking. On November 5, 2023, we had 'Platinum VIP Tickets' and were not eligible for any free Merchandise. On April 7, 2023, same band (Depeche Mode), we had 'Silver VIP Tickets' and received a bag of free Merchandise. The perks of each level of ticket needs to be crystal clear prior to purchase.

Review.Titre: Would be a full star review but…
Review.Contenu: Would be a full star review but the fees and rates that are added by ticket master (and ticket master only for the high rates and fees) are seriously insane. Overall good place to buy and resell concert/event tickets if not then from the original seller. 👍

Review.Titre: Line ups were too long, unorganized
Review.Contenu: Line ups were too long. Our tickets did not give gate entrances to enter and everyone seemed to enter in the main gate. Very unorganized

Review.Titre: Beware of additional shows added and multply prices.
Review.Contenu: The Come FromAway show was fantastic. However purchasing tickets months in advance on Ticketmaster was not easy. #1. We are in our seventies and not computer wizzards so NOT being able to print our tickets with bar codes (Compared to how easy it was before Ticketmaster) was discouraging and  time consuming and in my opinion, unecessasary. #2. Prices are inflated and everyone rushing to ensure a good seat just makes you accept a lesser seating arrangement only to find oiut a month or so later several new show dates have been added and some people got better priced tickets than us because it appeared only two seats were available together and they were on the floor ...that was for the matinee Nov 19....After many attempts to get tickets printed it was obvious we had to try another approach or not see the show....so through friends and several attempts we got our tickets on the phone and didn't feel comfortable until they were scanned at showtime.....According to friends who purchased their tickets for an additional show, they seem to have gotten a better deal...compared to our floor seats for $235. Not happy with whole process but The show was great because it was about our home province of Newfoundland.

Review.Titre: Fairly good show but Ticketmaster should not false advertise
Review.Contenu: Fairly good show, no stage video monitors to see band members.  Biggest disappointment was the lead singer of the Doobie Brothers was not on stage.Who I really wanted to see as shown in your ticket master offer / picture was not present

Review.Titre: Well the fact that the tour showed pics…
Review.Contenu: Well the fact that the tour showed pics of the founder of the band Tom would be there was deceiving point blank. The band sounded good but the security? Needs to have various ethnicities involved not just one that is known to be disrespectful to the female gender. Two  run ins with an aggressive man threatening a sixty yr old woman if I did not step into the penalty box? Ya you should get I touch with me as it was unacceptable to be bullied by the staff.

Review.Titre: There should be a standard processing…
Review.Contenu: There should be a standard processing fee!!! Should not change with the price of the ticket.  I would not use ticketmaster if there were other options for the concerts I want to attend.

Review.Titre: I liked the payment process and…
Review.Contenu: I liked the payment process and uploading the tickets with QR code onto my phone.  I tried to transfer 2 of the tickets to friends who were caught in a traffic jam but she would not have been granted admission unless I went all the way to the entrance with my phone to get her scanned in off my phone.  I use a walker to get around and this was difficult.  Also it was very unclear about different rates for seniors and children.  I paid full price for 4 seniors and 1 child.

Review.Titre: When i transferred my tickets to my…
Review.Contenu: When i transferred my tickets to my Apple Wallet, the Wallet app did not show a QR or UPC code, making the tickets unusable from that app.  I had to use the TM app to gain admission, which is OK, but it would have been good if the tech support people at Ticketmaster had been able to offer some useful assistance to get my tickets in the the Wallet app working right.
Like: seatsDislike: seats should be organized by what side you are cheering for. There is nobody who came around the stands with nuts, hotdogs  popcorn, drinks. Nothing was brought around at all.

What would be a great app sucks sometimes when using it, it prompts you to change password , then you can't login after successfully changing password. Making it frustrating when entering the venue and you can't login.

It took 35 minutes to get in the gate, then we spent 40 minutes stuck (not moving at all) in the concourse trying to get to our seats.  We missed the players coming out, introductions, treaty acknowledgement, fly over, anthem and first and second goals of the first period.I had a panic attack in the middle of the concourse because bigger men were starting to push and we started getting squished into the people in front of us.  I'm 5'1" and a lady beside me was well under 5'.   There were numerous seniors and small children that were pushed and squeezed as well.  It was truly terrifying.I will not be attending any other events at this venue as we still experienced lengthy wait times to get in the gates when attending Garth Brooks but no where near to the danger that we experienced last Saturday.

The entry to Commonwealth stadium was terrible, they were ill-equipped to run 55,000 people through security for a 55,000 seat stadium. Did they not know they were sold out? Concession were brutal, ran out of food and some beverages.The atmosphere and setting for the game itself was terrific.
It was east to book. The problem was the ushers had a hard time scanning moving barcode. Had to call a supervisor over.

Muddled sound. The sound engineer created too much mid-lower bass boost on the drummers kick. This causes the mid and mid-high frequencies  to become overwhelmed and do not project forward.This band is known for their guitars and vocals...not a strong beat of the bass drum.It almost ruined my experience.

Would have been nice if the main singer knew the narrative better also ear phones fit him better, very distracting to see him adjusting continuously. Too bad there were technicians on stage during performance adjusting electrical. However the songs were very well done!!

Most things went well but I ran into trouble trying to transfer a ticket to my friend. The mobile authentication for the transfer kept failing and customer service told me to do the transfer on PC. That worked but the mobile experience is still lacking

Cole swindell , Nate smith and Avery Anna were all fabulous! The Rama theatre in Orillia was unbelievably hot and uncomfortable! Thousands of people on a warm night and no AC! For the price we paid I would expect a comfortable experience.

Review.Titre: What is going on in the parking lot
Review.Contenu: What is going on in the parking lot! Arrive at game 200 level  [not cheap]. Told lot I have been going to forever is closed for prepaid only. Sent to back lot9 raining now no covered walkway. Now for the bigger inconvenience the lot takes no cash must download app? Really. Ended up paying a nice man in parking lot with cash machine. This is unacceptable.  Oh yeah my wife has mobility issues. Thanks for this experience lol.
The venue was not the best for Acoustics. Also, the unfortunate part was that FarmFair had just happened and the lingering smell was not great 😞The performers were awesome !! 👍🏼

Review.Titre: Skip the pre paid parking, and pull into any of the parking lots in the area for half the price.
Review.Contenu: I loved everything except the parking at the bell venue, I pre paid 41$ for parking on ticket master, and when I arrived at the venue I spent 30 minutes attempting to get into the parking lot with no luck. I then paid 20$ to park in a different lot 3 blocks from the venue and walked to the show. Worst parking system ever.

Review.Titre: Venue concessions were not prepared or…
Review.Contenu: Venue concessions were not prepared or staffed correctly. Crowd control was non existent. Merch tables were in very bad spots for the size of crowds, should have been set up outside before and after the event

Concert was great, however the venue had no seating, except for a very small section for people with mobility issues. Most of the people at the concert were 50+.  Having nowhere to sit was very disappointing.

Billy Talent absolutely KILLED IT! They were amazing!! However, the rest of the night kinda sucked. It was hardly a "Halloween Party", more of a concert with people in costumes. It was really disappointing in that respect. The venue was great for the obvious reasons, location, parking, being able to go enjoy the casino. However, the staff there were absolutely terrible. I was asked for my ID at least 8 times throughout the night (I am 45yrs old) and it got ridiculous. I was asked for more identification than when I fly internationally! I understand AGLC has it's rules, but this was definitely overkill. So, the No Halloween Vibe, rude staff, and having to practically provide a DNA test to get through any door nearly ruined the night...but then Billy Talent totally saved it with an unbelievable performance. Thanks to them it was a fun night.

Review.Titre: I do not own a smart phone and…
Review.Contenu: I do not own a smart phone and therefore it is extremely difficult for me to access tickets and must depend on someone else's phone.

Portable potties for bathrooms?? They were very dirty. No toilet paper and awful wash stations. This was the washroom option for floor tickets. Also had these types of washrooms on mezzanine level. When you pay $500/ticket, venue should offer at minimal, decent facilities.

I HATE that there is no option for a paper ticket.  This causes me great stress and then when we did get there, initially my daughters ticket on her phone wouldn't work and this took more than 20 minutes to figure out at the box office.  HATE!!

Review.Titre: Encanto Live Band & Sing Along Experience
Review.Contenu: It was nice to have a live band.  What could of made the experience worth the price paid for tickets was to have the disney characters performing the songs with the crowd to make the sing along more interactive.  The experience felt more like we were watching the movie. It wasnt worth the money spent.

I found the show confusing.  I wasn't expecting to sit through the entire movie with a live band.  When the intermission came it was so sudden with no announcement that I wasn't sure if that was it or not. Although I now understand the premise, the end of the show where they sang and got people involved could have been the show itself if a few more songs were added in. I think most people felt the same as half of the venue cleared out as soon as the movie ended.  At that point I thought the last song was the the finale, but then they did a few more songs and a mash up.  The only reason I knew it wasn't over, was because the lights didn't come on.The performers were talented, no doubt.  But the show itself should have been laid out better or a program issued so we'd be aware of what was happening throughout.
:) Easy to buy online.:( Too expensive.:( Only three seat options.:) Easy to have tickets on phone.

Review.Titre: If you stopped charging so much for…
Review.Contenu: If you stopped charging so much for tickets I and millions more people would be happier

Review.Titre: When I booked I do not recall that the…
Review.Contenu: When I booked I do not recall that the seats I purchased were with an obstructed view - if this was stated somewhere it should have been I bigger print or required an acknowledgement fromme. The purchase itself was straight forward. I was surprised to read about the entry policy and bags - however I saw many folks entering with bags that were not see through and they were searched and went on their way. The directions to our seats were minimal with little signage - this could be improved.

I received an email solicitation from ticketmaster advising me of a discount using a promotional code (FIRSTDOWN).  Through the purchase process I did not see the opportunity to input this code and as a result did not receive the discounted price.  When I followed up with Ticketmaster I was advised tough luck - if you didn't enter it nothing could be done.  No problem it was my fault - I just don't understand the follow up in not honoring the offered discount.

The acoustics weren’t good.  The music was too loud and Tyler’s voice was being drowned out.  Even when he was speaking, it was hard to understand what he was saying.  It could be because we were sitting in the upper balcony, I don’t know. Even though I loved his songs, I was disappointed with the quality of the sound.

Concert was excellent, very organized once inside the venue.*Would like to have the option of printing tickets via Ticketmaster.Parking situation was a nightmare at the Abbotsford Events Centre.  We arrived by car two blocks down the street from the venue an hour before the concert start time and it took over an hour to get into the parking lot from the street. We then had to eventually park in the furthest parking lot from the venue doors in the adjoining college.  Many people in this parking lot were confused as to where to purchase parking and how to walk to the venue from this location.  By the time we purchased a parking ticket and walked back to the doors of the venue, we missed the first 40 MINUTES of the concert , arriving in our assigned seats at 8:40pm. (Concert was scheduled to start at 8:00pm).We have been to events in this venue in the past and it has never taken this long to get into the parking lot and then park a vehicle.  In the past, the venue has had flag persons assisting vehicles on the road, and at the signal lights, into the venue parking lot to keep traffic organized.  There were many other attendees in this same situation. (The concert itself was excellent).

I want paper tickets back. This phone crap sucks. I have to conserve battery all day just so I can still gain entry to my expensive events. There is no way it's too expensive or bad for the environment

Review.Titre: A great vocalist who put on a great show
Review.Contenu: I have grown up listening to Atif Aslam’s music since I was like 6, so finally being able to see him live was incredible.He’s an incredible vocalist with a vibe vocal range, who sung his heart out but was so groovy at the same time.

Review.Titre: Unable to load my tickets into my…
Review.Contenu: Unable to load my tickets into my wallet.  Your website said to contact ticketmaster but they were unable to assist.  Also very hard to find a phone number.  The chat box was useless.

Review.Titre: You should let people resell their…
Review.Contenu: You should let people resell their tickets as low as they want. Especially when they upgraded and purchased crazy expensive Platinum tickets from you

Review.Titre: It would be fantastic to be able to…Smooth service
Review.Contenu: It would be fantastic to be able to phone for tickets. The whole process of buying tickets was painful. I didn't know my password for ticket master and had to get a new one. In the meantime the tickets could have sold out. Technology and so -called progress isn't always better. IT ISN"T FASTER.

Ticketmaster authorize resellers to buy big quantity of tickets. And those people know how to do it.  They log-in long in advance. When I logged-in 5 minute prior the start I was 398 in line.  This can be OK if those 397 before me buy 2-5 tickets. But When it was my time there were no more tickets to sit my son and I near to each other.  A couple of minutes after, there were a lot of tickets available by the resellers at a higher price.  I understand that Ticketmaster is a business and it is marvelous to be able to get the commission twice on the same ticket, but this is not faire for the fans.  The NHL should use a different system for the tickets

The show itself was great. But got an email beforehand saying they had “moved your seats to provide you with a better view”- we got moved from upper level first row and dead centre to upper level second highest row, last seats before the blocked off section. Had to sit with our heads rotated to see the entire show and left with a sore neck. Seats were not improved at all as they had suggested

Review.Titre: Not being able to print the tickets
Review.Contenu: Not being able to print the tickets is a pain  Not all people have smart phones and not all like or able to put in a wallet.  Heard many complaining about that hassle  Also if one person gets a group of tickets takes too much time to send to others  Old way is much better easier safer for purchaser and makes a much easier process  You do for other events why change for the Royal  enough thing dealing with a event down town TO let alone having problems getting tickets together so you can go with friends or family group

Review.Titre: Well I bought first row ticket on the…
Review.Contenu: Well I bought first row ticket on the aide of thé stage for thé show. Then They nove thé stage to have more people… i wasn’t first row anymore and i have to pay $50 to change it.I was Really not happy. You should call to let us know or sens an e-mail and change it for free

Review.Titre: The concert was supposed to start at 8…
Review.Contenu: The concert was supposed to start at 8 pm; however we were atill in a long lineup outside at 8 pm. The show started before we even got to our seat. Being new to the venue I couldn't find my seat and no staff were visible in the hallway to help forect me. All the staff seemed to be at the doors still doing security checks. It was chaos in my opinion. The band however was great. I would have given a much higher score had it not been for the venue's problems.

Review.Titre: I don't know who hired the security for…
Review.Contenu: I don't know who hired the security for the Arena for Tool but they stood with their heads in my way for a quarter of the show I asked them to move and they asked me if I wanted to get kicked out of the concert nice people you have working for you

Review.Titre: Must fix overseas credit card issue.
Review.Contenu: I am visiting from overseas. I managed to successfully buy a single Standard Ticket for Day 2 a day prior to the event by using my overseas credit card, and the process was smooth. However, on the morning of Day 3, I wanted to buy a Verified Resale Ticket but the system was not able to process my overseas credit card this time. As a result, I missed it out on Day 3, which was very disappointing.

Review.Titre: Seats got changed and not for the better.
Review.Contenu: I purchased my tickets with very specific ideas. At the left end of the row in a section that had a straight view of the stage, not a side on one. We'll got there and they closed that section but upgraded our tickets to seats where I could not kick my left knee out, and where I had to kink my neck to look at the stage. That was very disappointed and defeated why I picked the seats that I did.
My experience using ticketmaster was fine. I sat I hold and then purchased my tickets through you, you sent me my tickets. The band was fantastic - 5 stars. Ticketmaster had nothing to do with that.

I loved concert, but unfortunately we missed half of the VIP show as both our tickets showed it starting at 8:10 and concert at 8:15...didn't make sense to me..but it was my first time at that location..so I thought I'd show up a bit early to be sure. The VIP had started at 7 and we showed the volunteers the time on our tickets . They felt bad.  Outside of the error on that side..the bands were awesome.

Review.Titre: scanning the parking pass at the garage…
Review.Contenu: scanning the parking pass at the garage didn't work.  I still had to pay a convenience fee.  Also, i think the online-pre purchase was $5 more than if I paid in person

Review.Titre: The seats at Massey Hall were terrible
Review.Contenu: The seats at Massey Hall were terrible! The speaker almost covered the entire big screen behind the stage so we couldn’t watch the big screen at all. The artists and MCs were mostly standing on the left side of the stage so we couldn’t see them either. We finally moved to standing room only were we could see everything but we paid for seats, not standing room.

Review.Titre: Can't add tickets to Apple Wallet
Review.Contenu: There is something about my TM account that does not give me the option of adding my tickets to my Apple Wallet. That is a real nuisance. Last year it was fine so I don't know what happened this year.

Review.Titre: Angry that we could not transfer but sell thru Ticketmaster  only
Review.Contenu: It was not well communicated at any point from time of purchase that  a family member could not buy the tickets and transfer them to another family member. It was very stressful to think that they might not get in if I did not accompany them.
Too much 'fluff' on the scenes, makes it difficult to navigate site quickly!! Get rid of unnecessary promos!

Review.Titre: Option to add tickets to wallet was…
Review.Contenu: Option to add tickets to wallet was just prior to event, could that be changed to earlier?
Your service fees are ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!! I make every effort not to use you.
I dont Know why but our ticket were nit in the application but in a email That was send back in Setember. This was uwfull for the entrance at the venue. Nearly misses the VIP portion.
Concert was good. Dealing with tickmater and thier over pricing and fees always sucks. Haven't seen a reasonable ticket price in 10 years.

Review.Titre: The service fee per ticket is…
Review.Contenu: The service fee per ticket is outrageous. Why a service fee if the ticket is delivered electronically. One more way to gouge the consumer.

Review.Titre: Ticket process was easy, but it should include gate #
Review.Contenu: Ticket process was easy. However ticket did not include a gate # which made it hard to figure out which line up to join. And also after lining up for a good 10 min we were asked To move to other line up closer  to our section.

Review.Titre: The Danforth Music Hall has a strange…
Review.Contenu: The Danforth Music Hall has a strange policy of not allowing rucksacks into the venue irrespective of size, while allowing tote bags, even large ones into the hall. This is a very strange and irrational policy given that all bags are searched. No alternative is provided and the security were unhelpful, even belligerent. A significant number of patrons were forced to find alternative places to store their rucksacks (at stores and bars along the Danforth). Clannad were wonderful; It is unfortunate that this unreasonable policy impacted the enjoyment of so many patrons.

Line to slowThe concert itself was great when we finally got in. We lined up at 6:50 and didn’t even get in til after the concert had started which was very disappointing. We missed the first couple of songs. It was so slow going thru the line. Also having TV screens so we could see at the back would have been great
Bought the tickets on release day. I was outraged to see a “surge pricing” affect the cost after I had selected my tickets and moved to check out. Easy to use. But disgusted but the abuse
Band wasn’t all there. They’re losing their focus on what matters. Won’t pay to see them again but hope they get it together to change my mind

Review.Titre: Skate Canada Tickets were mailed out way too late
Review.Contenu: Tickets were mailed out way too late.  I only received them 2 days before I left for Vancouver for the event.  This caused a lot of stress.  Why did we even need paper Tickets?  Why weren't they emailed?  Felt like a step back in time.

Review.Titre: The music was mixed too loud
Review.Contenu: The music was mixed too loud. The vocals were buried by the music. That’s unfortunate.

Review.Titre: The beer and food was expensive
Review.Contenu: The beer and food was expensive. The pretzels and spaetzle was not edible but Zwicks did give us a package of pretzels to compensate, which was good. The musical choices were great.

Review.Titre: I didn’t think it was fair that seats…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t think it was fair that seats were added closer to the date of the concert. That wasn’t fair to people who thought they were sitting close to the stage but actually were not.

Review.Titre: It was different than I expected
Review.Contenu: It was different than I expected . Where were the vampires!!!!I lot of clown work .. that was unexpected..The acts were fantastic

Review.Titre: Easy to use, tough to buy tickets
Review.Contenu: After getting the ticket everything was smooth - but buying tickets was a mess with changing prices by the time you try to pay, as well as seat availability changing within 30 seconds or so!

Everything worked well except for two niggles. The informational links in your mail only worked on my cell phone and did not work on my PC. The other was that, on the PC, it sometimes thought I was bot.
Having the large screens would have enhanced the experience. Good and drink prices at Rogers outrageous.
I bought two tickets.  When downloading, only one ticket downloaded.  At the door of the venue, I had to find my tickets and find the second ticket for entry.
I wasn't able to attend the game so I transferred the tickets to a friend. For some reason I was not allowed to transfer the parking pass I bought, not sure why?

Review.Titre: I dislike the fact we pay so much extra…
Review.Contenu: I dislike the fact we pay so much extra for fees! I get nobody works for free, but with how many tickets you dole out for events, how about $2?? Why so much? 😑

Review.Titre: Unable to add to apple wallet
Review.Contenu: I would love to be able to add the ticket to my Apple wallet. But it would not let me after trying countless different methods
Price for tickets is far too expensive. It is completely ridiculous sand should never be that high.

Review.Titre: You guys need to have live agents to…
Review.Contenu: You guys need to have live agents to talk to so disappointing you got rid of live humans to talk to about issues

Review.Titre: The show was wonderful and entering was…
Review.Contenu: The show was wonderful and entering was very easy with the app. However, I had booked the wrong day by mistake and early efforts ( a day later)  to change the tickets were met with a big "No" or "you could sell them online"Being a senior, I did not feel equipped to handle that challenge

Review.Titre: Smooth experience; and an efficiency tip.
Review.Contenu: Everything was fairly smooth, making it an enjoyable and easy experience for us to see Doja Cat. I have some feedback regarding the diff ticket types/tiers: perhaps the door staff can point the patrons to locations they should be aware of based on their ticket type/tier. I.e., if the VIP ticket includes a merch package to be picked up at a certain desk, it would be great if the staff noticed this when scanning our tix and pointed out the desk or other line/location. Would be efficient and save time for patrons to navigate through the crowded entrances.

Review.Titre: The purchase of seat tickets and…
Review.Contenu: The purchase of seat tickets and parking was straightforward as well as the transfer process. The only problem was that the parking could not be transferred and alternative means were required to show proof that the parking was prepaid. This needs to be rectified to make the transfer process seamless.

Review.Titre: It was a great experience 😊I really…
Review.Contenu: It was a great experience 😊I really enjoyed the show, amazing performances Thank you
Crew and performers with the Crystal performance were amazing.  So much talent!

Review.Titre: Good but some changes can be made
Review.Contenu: Ice was smaller than previous years so centre ice seats felt as though you were sitting too far back for prime seats. There was not enough of Mickey,Minnie, etc compared to previous shows. The two show hosts could not keep the audiences attention. The second part of the show was the best and really got the children's attention and excitement up.As for the venue, it is really distasteful that there is an explicit adult event occurring in the same building as a children's event. The seats are super scrunched with no leg room for tall adults.

It was a cute, light play. The actors were great and it was a wonderful afternoon with friends.  The theatre itself is beautiful and worth seeing anything in that venue. Not a bad seat in the entire space.

Our experience was memorable because the concert was really good AND we were chosen by a Scotia Bank arena ambassador to move from nose bleeds to a VIP seating area.    Thank Goodness because for $158 plus transportation to and from, we were 2nd row from the top of the arena with the last two seats in the row.  FOR $158 !!!!.  So concert good, better seats, good, $58 in processing fees - NOT GOOD

Review.Titre: My phone wouldn’t connect to your wifi…
Review.Contenu: My phone wouldn’t connect to your wifi but Meaghan was wonderful.  She walked us to the box office so our tickets could be printed.  It bugs the heck out of me that we can’t print tickets, or at least collect them at the box office, prior to the event.  Not everyone has a phone and it’s not fair to be forced, as I felt I was, to get one just so I could enter a venue.

Review.Titre: The show itself was excellent getting…
Review.Contenu: The show itself was excellent getting into the arena was terrible. Over an hour on line to get in the show had started before many people managed to get in. The line up extended to front street. Would avoid this venue on the future. Really inefficient entry process.

There was simply one issue that turned this from a 5 to a 4 star. With being unable to screen shot the QR code it virtually made it impossible to scan. Underground parking with no service means no data usage. So despite the fact that it had been opened minutes before getting to the parking gate it would not come up. Thankfully I had screenshots of everything verifying that I had paid for parking.

All the service was good except the sharing of the tickets with friends. I was strongly advised by the companu to share tickets, but despre my multiple requests for code to allow sharing of tickets, it did not worked. The company did not recognized the codes it sent to me by phone, call ora email.
Tickets were tricky to find. After locating them, transfer and download to wallet worked well. Performance was fantastic!

Tickets were in the app.  I got a new phone and could not get them back in the wallet.  I used the chat function and although we could not get the tickets back in the wallet, I was able to get instructions on how to use the tickets in the app. Great service.

Review.Titre: Nice venue, bar closed too early
Review.Contenu: Musicians were great. Nice intimate theatre space. Unfortunately the bar closed before the break between the opener and main act, which caught many attendees by surprise.

Review.Titre: My grandson Isaac is in the green group…
Review.Contenu: My grandson Isaac is in the green group and it was a thrillto see the first show.  It was entertaining and a great message at this time of year.  The singing is phenomenal and loved the interaction of all the cast.Bravo!

Review.Titre: Purchasing the tickets was very easy
Review.Contenu: Purchasing the tickets was very easy, although the seating charts are a little small. Still, we got excellent seats. The venue doesn't have WiFi and I don't have data, so we had to pick up our tickets at Will Call. Again, a little inconvenient but not horrible. There was no indication of where the swag was being sold and we didn't find it until the end when they didn't have the sizes we needed and that was very disappointing. I would say Ticketmaster did a great job but Core Entertainment let us down a bit.Also, the parking was horrid and the staff at the exit to the hall gave us very vague directions on how to get to it that weren't right. Again, not a Ticketmaster issue but Core Entertainment failed.
Boney M was awesome. Opening act was not to our liking. They were definitely talented musicians but the songs were not what I would go to the concert to hear if they were the only attraction.

Review.Titre: Robert Klein is extremely talented but I don't like his politics
Review.Contenu: Robert Klein is extremely talented and funny.However, my experience was marred by having to listed to his left-wing/Democratic political views. Highly inappropriate. He should not be dumping on Donald Trump during these terrible times for our people.. Israel has had no better friend in the White House. He should keep his political views to himself and stick to songs and jokes.

Review.Titre: Excellent spectacle, mais le son trop fort.
Review.Contenu: Excellent spectacle, par contre, le son était beaucoup trop fort et l’effet de distortion était désagréable. Les sièges sont très tassés au Capitole…

Review.Titre: It was very easy to purchase the…
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to purchase the tickets and even easier to access them once we were at the arena.

Review.Titre: This was my 1st time using Ticketmaster…
Review.Contenu: This was my 1st time using Ticketmaster so it took a bit of navigating to fiqure it all out but once that was done it turned out to be a great experience. More then likely the younger generation would have fiqured it all out in no time. Would use them again.One thing, it would have been nice to have the seat numbers at time of ordering so we knew a little better where our seats were.

Anthony was great! Wonderful performer. The opening act was for me poor, a grade F. Her squeaky voice was irritating; I could not relate to her. Vancouver has its own great comedians I’d rather have seen as an opening act. The 3rd floor bar was closed and that meant 2nd floor bar was more crowded. Oh well. Seats, site lines & acoustics are all great. All in all, a very worthwhile event once again at QE Theatre. Thank you.

Tool made the experience great, not Ticketmaster. The cost of tickets were outrageous. I paid $1300+ for non VIP seats, when some VIP packages were cheaper. The only thing that made my purchase worthy through Ticketmaster was the payment plan option.

Review.Titre: I was able to get up front and close…
Review.Contenu: I was able to get up front and close with the concert which is almost impossible to do without paying a ton of money for it. The auditorium the concert was at could've been bigger. The price was reasonable and the staff were very professional.

Review.Titre: The best thing for me was that I could…
Review.Contenu: The best thing for me was that I could not use the virtual ticket because I do not have a smart phone, but we were given printed tickets at the box office.Could you please go back to the option of printing a ticket at home?

Review.Titre: If you need to change your tickets I don't think there should be fees attached.
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the Ticketmaster app for this year's Royal Winter Fair Horseshow.  One less thing to carry. Theatre tickets another matter, when trying to exchange them more fees apply and given the amount already taken in service charges, that's just not right.

It was very easy to navigate the site with straightforward instructions provided.  Updates  via email were sent as the date approached.  As someone not used to using digital tickets I was a bit apprehensive not having a hard copy of my tickets but I was pleasantly surprised how easy it was to just scan my phone.

Review.Titre: The show was just what I thought it…
Review.Contenu: The show was just what I thought it would be. Super engaging and interactive with the crowd

My ONLY complaint is that when I try to buy 2 tickets and 3 seats are left together, it prevents me from doing so as you cannot leave one seat.  Yet when I look around the stadium in various sections, single seats are plentiful so i don’t understand how that occurred if I cannot purchase seats leaving a single seat.Everything else is very easy to use on the Ticketmaster site.
Really enjoyed it. Thankyou.,

Review.Titre: Please fix the ticket scalping & give…
Review.Contenu: Please fix the ticket scalping & give the artist more money.

Review.Titre: He was hilarious but the opening…
Review.Contenu: He was hilarious but the opening comedian Blair Socci wasn’t my cup of tea. Lots of noises and really didn’t get her style of comedy

Review.Titre: TesseracT Amazing. Sound Mixing Not So Much
Review.Contenu: Band was 10/10 amazing and zero complaints. Venue organization and management was solid 9/10. Sound mixing was not good. 6/10 at best.Set list, to the best of my recollection:1. Natural Disaster2. Echoes3. Luminary4. King5. Of Mind - Nocturne6. Smile7. The Arrow8. Legion9. War of Being10. The Grey11. Juno12a. Acceptance - Concealing Fate Pt. 112b. Deception - Concealing Fate Pt. 212c. The Impossible - Concealing Fate Pt. 3

Review.Titre: the production of the show was top…
Review.Contenu: the production of the show was top shelf. The supporting band was compiled of great musicians, the drummer was exceptional and was key in keeping the whole production tight and intact. The priniclple is a consumate professional interacting with the crowd between songs to keep them interested. The only unfortunate thing for me was that she has a limited register in her voice now and she is protecting it which affects her ability to deliver a top notch version of her many hits.

We purchased tickets with ease, had no problem adding them to our app for easy entry and no troubles displaying them for our entire group from one device. Access was a little confusing, with little direction, but once at the gate it was quick and easy to get thru and to our seats. Only thing to be aware of, is you have to go through a transfer process if you require others to carry their own tickets, paper and screenshots are not accepted.

I decided to pick my tickets up at will call. Which was done after that day I purchase this, and unfortunately the guy had to re-print them as he cannot find them. Not very organized. Linda Evangelista event was amazing, very open and honest and down to earth.Lots of stories about her day as a model, & present days

Review.Titre: the venue and concert were fabulous, parking not so
Review.Contenu: the venue and concert were fabulous. the parking scenario not so much. There were only 2 parking attendants at the entry to the venue. There were NO handicapped parking stalls (they were taken up by the trucks for gear for the band). So, we ended up parking at the neighbouring university parking lot. In fact, we were walking behind a woman with a walker, not okay for people with mobility issues.

- Easy purchase, great as someone put them back up for resale.- AMAZING Concert 💕 up there as one of my favourites!- Entrance to get into venue was BRUTAL (approximately 40 minutes), but at least our seats were close to gate we entered at.  Majority of people complaining worst they’ve ever experienced!

Adam Sandler very talented especially on his guitar and singing.   Wished he brought his movie regulars as his entourage but great seeing the other acts especially Kevin James.  Loved the tribute to Chris McFarley.  Touching

Review.Titre: When purchasing tickets it should be…
Review.Contenu: When purchasing tickets it should be explained what is being included in the VIP package. We received a gift but arrived early and had to stand around waiting to get into the Theatre. We would have come later if we had known we had to stand around doing nothing.

The show was excellent. Very well organized and presentation. Sound quality was really good. As a suggestion it would good if there could be a message to other concert goers that holding bright phones up to take videos (which are otherwise on YouTube) is very annoying and distracting. It’s a bright light and blocks the view. Much appreciate the opportunity to provide feedback.

Entire purchasing process is smooth. I like the transparency of having fees included in the ticket prices when we view them. My only issue is with ticket scalping and resellers. I think fans would appreciate being able to buy tickets at cost.

Ticketmaster was easy to use.  I don't have a problem with e-tickets, however two of the people I attended with do not have a smartphone.  Therefore, if they wanted to go to a concert/event that I wasn't interested in, they're out of luck!  That's unfortunate. There are still people out there who work with paper.  I know this is also the Canadian Tire Centre's process/regulation of being paperless.

As a basketball fan who’s been to multiple games including all the ones hosted in Montreal. The ticket price jump this year was uncalled for specially for pre-season. Other than that great experience and atmosphere. Would be nice if some people weren’t seating in others seats .. but love the energy and moment.

Review.Titre: We had a great time at the concert
Review.Contenu: We had a great time at the concert, only problem everyone had was the start time. Ticket said 6 pm so everyone arrived early only to have to stand out in the cold
Shania was amazing!  Lines to enter the venue and scan tickets were very slow.  Bathrooms were mot cleaned or maintained throughout the evening and were disgusting by midway through the night.

The show itself was excellent. What we found lacking was instructions on where to go and how to use our valet express entry. It was our first time at the Windsor Coliseum and we had no idea what to do. There ended up being a few steps we had to do to validate ticket etc. Maybe instructions on the ticket itself might be a good idea.

The show was amazing! Can’t say anything but positive praise for the show. Great talent and was very entertaining. This was my first time at the Casino Rama venue and I didn’t find the seating to be comfortable and exiting the parking lot after the show took an extremely long time, nearly 30 mins.

Review.Titre: Once I could access ticket there were…
Review.Contenu: Once I could access ticket there were no problems. Bit of delay being able to put tickets in my wallet but once I could very easy to enter venue. I like that system for all the tickets I purchase.

Review.Titre: It was great and I had bought tickets…
Review.Contenu: It was great and I had bought tickets several months ahead. I thought you could have released the final tickets more than a week or so before the concert, as I am used to handling physical tickets, I was getting a little concerned about that. Otherwise….all worked out!

It was wonderful!Only downside is that nowhere on the ticket did it say anything about opening performers who took up 2 hours of the entire show. The show itself didn’t start until 9pm even though it was advertised to start at 7:30pm

Review.Titre: Went to see Marco Antonio Solis at the…
Review.Contenu: Went to see Marco Antonio Solis at the Coca Cola Coliseum in Toronto. Great production, nice stage and screens were perfect for enhancing a song and seeing the artists close up. Fantastic sound, and Marco Antonio Solis delivered all of his hits. The Coliseum however needs way more bathrooms, and entrances to get inside. It’s a tight squeeze to get into the main entrance with only a few doors. They should it up with more entrances to let the people in more smoothly.
Cost of tickets is ridiculous. Ticketmaster being a third party scalping site is obscene. You should be embarrassed

Review.Titre: Well I paid  over 1000 dollars for 3…
Review.Contenu: Well I paid  over 1000 dollars for 3 tickets in august … it was half that in October.. I realize you have to sell the seats but I should’ve been given the option for better seats as the person beside me oaid half of what I did
it was a good experience, the website was legit and didn’t make it seem like i was getting scammed. buying the tickets, i wish that there wasn’t a timer to buy the tickets.

Review.Titre: My tickets didn’t work on the app
Review.Contenu: My tickets didn’t work on the app, also, it wouldn’t let me add my tickets to my Apple Wallet because I’m not in the cloud - that’s more secure than airplane tickets!

Review.Titre: Talented performers with a sense of…
Review.Contenu: Talented performers with a sense of humor.  However, the volume was a bit too loud.  Hard to hear the voices sometimes.
The concert itself was great The venue was a smaller so there were no bad seats, the staff were more than accommodating

Andre Rieu was fabulous as usual except I found the concert over too quickly.  Probably because I didn’t want it to end.  We found the guest Gospel Choir went on too long…1-2 songs fine but we came to see and hear Andre, not them :/ The Rogers Centre was a better venue for him though…I saw him there last time and it was so much better than floor seats at scotiabank.  I wouldn’t buy them again.  If he plays a different venue next time I’ll go.

This was my time using the ticket master app to download the 4 concert tickets to my iPhone wallet. Was a bit sceptical since the tickets are only available to download a week before the concert. Scanning all 4 tickets from my iPhone wallet at venue entrance was quick and efficient! The only downside is that there is no paper ticket as a keepsake.

Review.Titre: More ushers and signage on floor needed
Review.Contenu: Well there was a lot of confusion on the floor with too few ushers- many times we were interrupted in our seats by people saying we were in their seats .   In fact, these people were not ushered in nor was the signage big enough for people to see their proper section on the floor.  But the lights and the sound were great!

I grew up with these bands but haven't played their music in quite a while......until I saw the concerts.Helix did okay but Quiet Riot and Warrant, they were absolutely amazing!!  Apart from Quiet Riot having issues with the mic, it was a loud concert that shook the grandstand and had my ears ringing all night.
Purchase ticket at regular price. Will never use reseller. Need to eliminate resellers and higher prices.

Review.Titre: Michelle was unreal/ ticket master needs to step up tho
Review.Contenu: Michelle was unreal. She put on such a good show. Quality JFL comedian.I’m annoyed at the ticket master app and when going there was a woman with low/ no vision who the ticket checker could not assist. Watching this felt ignorant on ticket master’s part to properly train employees to help people with their app and not feel stress holding the line. It was hard enough for me to obtain my tickets last min through the app. I think this puts a damper on a light night.

Review.Titre: Nice and easy process to get my tickets…
Review.Contenu: Nice and easy process to get my tickets online.

My tickets were there for me, printed and ready to be scanned as we entered the stadium. The day was a bit cool so it took a couple of attempts to have them scanned. Eventually they had to type in the numbers under the bar code to get us through the turnstiles.

Review.Titre: Great show and the seat location was…
Review.Contenu: Great show and the seat location was magnificent. Just very slow getting out, as usual.

Easy to use the chat with someone,  however I wish we could have printed tickets on paper because I was having a problem with my ticket master app and my tickets weren't showing. I ended up going back to my email and added to goggle wallet.

Review.Titre: The band makes the magic happen
Review.Contenu: The band makes the magic happen. But logistically everything was set perfect. Transportation was on point. I located my seats easily, there was food at the location. I would recommend to include more canned alcoholic beverages like apple cider.

Shania twain putting on a good show. Seating for floor needs to be revamped somehow. Having to get in and out of aisle a 1000 times for drunk people is annoying as can be and takes away from the show.  God forbid you sit on the end of an aisle.

It's good that we have a place to go to buy tickets however I don't like service charges and hate when people buy all the tickets and then post them to resell at 3 times the price.  They have no intention of going but just make money.  There should be other companies to offer competition.

Review.Titre: I've been stopped at the entrance…
Review.Contenu: I've been stopped at the entrance because I had a metallic water bottle. I understand that it could be dangerous in rock show, but it was a kid show... Also, 18$ for a popcorn it's exaggerated! Finally, it was very long to go out of the parking (30 minutes).
It was decent show, Canada Life Centre the main common area needs so better venting in that place, with all those little food stands in there it awful
Floor seats great, other then guest with out floor tickets standing in front of us the whole time until security kicked them out. But need better control of the floor

Everything was straight forward very happy with your service.  I do have one comment though.  I had purchased these tickets for my parents who are in their 80's and are not great with cell phones.  I had tried to print off paper tickets, however I was told this concert was not eligible for that option.  This was a pain, not everyone is tech savy and I had to go with them to the door and had to write sticky notes for them to keep in their pockets with the details of their seats, so if they went to the bathroom they wouldn't forget.  Paper tickets should be available, especially for a concert like Andre Rieu that is an older demographic.

Review.Titre: It was great seeing tv girl just some…
Review.Contenu: It was great seeing tv girl just some of the people in the audience were ruthless trying to cut infront of people to get ahead and smoking in the crowd
Beautifully choreographed. However, only 3/4 of ice rink was visible to us.
The purchase was easy, I really appreciated all the reminders. I missed out on some of the VIP experience when one of the ushers directed us in the wrong door. Argh.
Tool show was best show I've seen in a long time. Ticketmaster fees are ridiculous. Having to download the ticketmaster app to access tickets was annoying.
Small venue easy to access and exit love the fact everything is on line no hard copy papers to carry around
Ease of buying and accessing our tickets makes this site very good. Sometimes it’s hard to see exactly which seats you’re getting.
Easy to purchase tickets.  Ticketmaster sent emails reminding us of our event coming up.
The actual experience was fine and went off without a hitch. Still not crazy about ticket prices in general and especially your fees, as well as the availability of the better seats.

Review.Titre: Pussy Riot.                                                         Learned a lot about Russia which I…
Review.Contenu: Learned a lot about Russia which I didn’t know and their performance was excellent. Another great evening out

The hardest part for me was purchasing the tickets.  I'm not tech savvy so I got booted out the first time because I didn't finish the transaction in the allotted time frame, but was successful on the second attempt because by then I knew what was needed in the way of credit cards, texting codes, etc.  I was afraid my receipt wouldn't print with my limited skills and was grateful to have Will Call (that's for us folks who don't have a smartphone) even though there was a fee for the service.  With all that said, we thoroughly enjoyed the Wiggles "Ready, Steady, Wiggle" tour performance in Hamilton.  These folks were awesome, and I was never so excited to sing "Fruit Salad" or "Baby Shark".   My kids, who are adults, loved seeing the live performance and enjoyed every minute of it singing along and doing the choreography.  It's way different being there than watching it online,  but now we have our very own experience to remember.   So much audience participation and interaction and the age of the audience was very mixed:  from young kids to grandparents.

Review.Titre: 7 pm doors open or start time?
Review.Contenu: 7 PM was the doors open time and not the start time of the event this should be more clearly indicated on the tickets. Customer experience would have been better.

Review.Titre: The staff was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: The staff was very helpful and friendly. I was very disappointed and I know many people around me where upset to just watch it in the big screen. I honestly could of stayed home and watched it in my tv and not spend 150.00.  The band was very good. But defiantly upset I was expecting a live theatre.
Buying, downloading, and scanning my tickets was super easy. App works great.
Purchasing is easy. I still like a printed ticket but ticket on my phone from the app good too. Charlotte was great!
Everything was good but concessions were very expensive.

The show was great and it was easy to access the tickets to scan. The only downfall was their was no barcode for the parking and had to deal with the situation going in and leaving. Otherwise, had a really good time.

Review.Titre: Getting into the venue was a mess
Review.Contenu: Getting into the venue was a mess. Doors didn’t open until 7, ok I get that but the organization of where to stand and how things were going to go was not good.

Review.Titre: The tickets were great and the show was…
Review.Contenu: The tickets were great and the show was even better. Ticketmaster was very good in their communications regarding the event.
Great seats, easy to find, mobile app was easier than I thought, however, still like the printed tickets for a keep sake
Great experience didn’t realize they would actually play the movie and add a band in front of the screen.
Great show. Good experience, would like to have personalized email day of or day before when show starts
You're doing well. The process is a fluid affair. Thank you for asking.    Mr. K.M. Trolland
Easy to get to tickets on my phone and join with Canucks app.easy to resell or transfer tickets.  Prices are crazy.

Review.Titre: Staff doing security were thorough and…
Review.Contenu: Staff doing security were thorough and very reasonable. I appreciated the level of security provided as well as the police presence.

This was our 3rd Cirque du Soleil show we’ve scene. The other 2 were in Las Vegas. Like all their shows they keep you on the edge on your seat. Very entertaining at a reasonable price. We will definitely continue to attend further shows in the future. Entertainment for all ages.

The dancers were superb, the scenery and costumes spectacular.  The show had 100% of my attention throughout the show. I had seen the Nutcracker many years ago,but do not remember it as being as eventful as this production.  Will definitely attend it again at the first opportunity .

Review.Titre: The line was massive as it was a sold…
Review.Contenu: The line was massive as it was a sold out show but it moved very quick! Ticketmaster was so easy to use. From finding seats, to paying, to the reminders before the show, to scanning in at the entrance… it was all a breeze!

Review.Titre: The ticket purchasing process was very easy
Review.Contenu: The ticket purchasing process was very easy and the follow-up reminders to the last day including the ticket attached. Also, it was nice to receive the heads-up, notifying us that traffic will be heavy due to Halifax city construction and road detours; all this wasw great service. The show was also amazing; Liz Mitchell and team did an amazing performance.
After the initial ticket buying try which timed out, it all went well, including using the app at the event.
The app was easy to navigate and worked quickly and easily. I liked the email a few days before the event with reminders and instructions.
From placing order, to having tickets scanned at stadium, real easy, smooth.
Event reminder sent, easy access to ticket if you have  phone.

Serena Ryder’s concert was fantastic. She has a wonderful voice and is a great and very engaging entertainer. It was the perfect Christmas experience because it seemed such a fresh way to sing all the old classics. Wonderful and I would go again next year!The Hailey’s were not my cup of tea and I didn’t enjoy them at all. They did their own songs for the most part and they all sounded the same and had the same theme. The two singers had good voices though.

I attended the concert recently, and it was hands down the best I've ever been to. Doja showcased incredible talent, keeping the audience entertained throughout with beautiful singing. Her outfit in Toronto was a personal favourite, adding a special touch to an already amazing experience.

To see a true rock legend speak about his best selling book and give first hand accounts of his life on the road and during the origins of Rush was truly a once in a lifetime opportunity. Definitely a 5 star experience. Loved it!

Review.Titre: The app was very easy and convenient to…
Review.Contenu: The app was very easy and convenient to use.Regular update emails arrived.

Review.Titre: Adding tickets to my iPhone Apple…
Review.Contenu: Adding tickets to my iPhone Apple Wallet was intuitive, easy and worked quick at the gate.

Review.Titre: Having the mobile ticket on my phone…
Review.Contenu: Having the mobile ticket on my phone was great and made entering the arena so much easier and faster than having paper tickets. Jeff Dunham was awesome and very funny.  Would definitely go again if he ever comes back to Calgary.

I was able to see exactly where the available seats were, with the prices clearly indicated. I was able to pay online for the ticket I wanted, and it could be accessed electronically on my mobile phone for smooth entry into the venue.

Review.Titre: Little  to do with Ticket Master
Review.Contenu: Little  to do with Ticket Master, but everything to do with the performers.  Fantastique!

Review.Titre: The entire process was simple and easy
Review.Contenu: The entire process was simple and easy. I also appreciated the reminders and tips to make it easy

Concert was great. Lots of staff working and kept things organized and helpful with helping people find their seats. Staff were wiping floors up constantly/efficiently as some people dont know how to walk with alcohol without spilling it LOL will attend something else again next year!

Review.Titre: It was easy to obtain tickets in this…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to obtain tickets in this venue. No obstacles at show time.

Review.Titre: Best show the family & I have seen in…
Review.Contenu: Best show the family & I have seen in years.Hopefully the revisit next year :)

Amazing unplugged feel with excellent vocals, covering a wide range of classics.  Loved the stories.  It's great to see how well Terri and Paul worked together.  This is a good tour for Terri, who's had relationship problems, to be teamed up with a happily married Paul, who is also a Christian believer.  Call it a miracle tour.
The sets were absolutely remarkable. Loved the dancing, music, costumes and lighting! What a lovely Christmas kick off!

Purchasing tickets on line was easy and efficient, great venue, easy to get to and the light show was amazing. Seats are tight for people with long legs. Enjoyed the show and would recommend it for people who like rock music
Great venue, great bands, great staff – a pleasure as always!
Outstanding show -great performers, fabulous music and amazing dancing/choreography-  a must see - will go to see again this year and take friends
From start to finish this was the best time I've had at the theatre in years. I will absolutely be going back. Congrats to everyone who made this possible!

Review.Titre: Everything went well from checking to…
Review.Contenu: Everything went well from checking to putvhaasing to attending the events using the ticketmaster app. Also liked th efact that Ticketmaster sent out the tixs via text on my phone.

Review.Titre: Tickets were easy to access on the app…
Review.Contenu: Tickets were easy to access on the app then went straight into my Apple wallet
Its was an unreal show.  Ticketmaster was uber greedy with their fees but everyone gets it....corporate greed is fairly common.

It was a great experience. Skyfall is my top “James Bond” film from the Daniel Craig era.  The orchestra did not disappoint with the soundtrack.   I would recommend the experience for other movies that have a memorable soundtrack.

I have seen the T.S.O. every year since the started toperform at the Massey Hall since 1999.Very professional with their performances..The best concerts that I have ever seen in my lifeat 71 years of age. I have seen them also in Buffaloand Tampa. Great performance as always.
Meeting Katie, Johnny Reid story telling, the high energy music, interaction, all of it
The event was superb. I loved the blend of music and performing acrobatics. Was good for all ages!
So easy to book tickets  love the reminders on event days
We had excellent tickets in the third row and were practically part of their family.  We really had a great view of the whole concert and enjoyed everything they performed. It was a tremendous show!

Review.Titre: I love their holiday shows and this one…
Review.Contenu: I love their holiday shows and this one was fabulous!  A nice mix of their Christmas songs and their hits and even new songs from the new album! They sing to the crowd and have so much fun including everyone in. Highly recommend their concerts!!
This was my first time using the Ticketmaster app and phone to enter the event with no printed tickets and everything ran smoothly!

Review.Titre: It was easy to navigate the site and…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to navigate the site and pick tickets.  Process to access tickets and get on wallet was easy and worked well.
We had a lot of fun. Great experience.
